name: Custom Song Folder
description: Save songs and SFX to a custom directory

custom-folder.name: Custom Song Directory
custom-folder.description: The <cy>directory</c> in which custom songs and SFX will be stored.

migrate-folder.name: Transfer From Directory
migrate-folder.description: The <cj>directory</c> from which songs and SFX will be transferred to your <cy>custom save directory</c>.

overwrite.name: Overwrite Files
overwrite.description: If enabled, transferring files will <cr>overwrite</c> those in the <cy>desination folder</c> with the same name. Otherwise, files with the same name will not be transferred.

button-setting.name: Transfer Songs
button-setting.description: Pressing the <cg>Transfer</c> button will move all songs from the <cj>'transfer from' directory</c> to your <cy>custom save directory.</c>
